heading: Automotive Research Clinics
subHeading: Specialized in-depth evaluation services for automotive products

carClinic.title: Car Clinic
carClinic.description: In-depth automotive research sessions designed to evaluate consumer perceptions, preferences, and expectations regarding cars and prototypes.
features: Conducted with car owners, intenders, or switchers to explore detailed feedback
Prototype testing with interior, exterior, and feature evaluations
Includes test drives and hands-on interactions (if applicable)
Assesses satisfaction, unmet needs, and emotional connections with vehicles
Helps refine design, branding, and positioning before launch
Can be conducted across multiple cities and demographic segments

bikeClinic.title: Bike Clinic
bikeClinic.description: Specialized research sessions focused on motorcycle users to understand behavior, brand perception, and product expectations.
features: Interactive evaluations with both current and potential users
Exploration of engine performance, comfort, mileage, and styling
Covers key influencers of buying decisions and brand switching
Useful for testing mockups, early concepts, or competitor benchmarks
Includes both individual interviews and group discussions
Ideal for fine-tuning features, pricing, and communication strategies
